basics.name: offeringType
basics.label: Offering type
basics.defaultValue: MAS Core + Cloud Pak for Data
basics.toolTip: Type of MAS offering.

allowedValues.label: MAS Core + Cloud Pak for Data
allowedValues.value: MAS Core + Cloud Pak for Data

allowedValues.label: MAS Core + Manage (no Cloud Pak for Data)
allowedValues.value: MAS Core + Manage (no Cloud Pak for Data)

basics.name: publicDomain
basics.label: Public domain
basics.toolTip: Public hosted zone to use. e.g. mydomain.myorg.com (Applicable only if a new OCP cluster is being created)

basics.name: publicDomainResourceGroup
basics.label: Public domain resource group
basics.toolTip: Provide the name of the resource group where public App Service domain is created (Applicable only if a new OCP cluster is being created)

basics.name: bootnodeSGIngressCidrIp
basics.label: Bootnode NSG Ingress CIDR IP range
basics.toolTip: Please set CIDR to x.x.x.x/32 to allow one specific IP address access, 0.0.0.0/0 to allow all IP addresses access, or another CIDR range to access Bootnode over SSH.

basics.name: clusterSize
basics.label: Cluster size
basics.toolTip: OCP cluster size. (small-3M,3W,3S medium-3M,5W,3S large-5M,7W,3S) (M-m5.2xlarge W-m5.4xlarge S-m5.4xlarge)

basics.name: openShiftClusterApiUrl
basics.label: OpenShift cluster API URL
basics.toolTip: Existing OCP cluster URL in the format https://api.[clustername].[domain]. Do not specify port number, 6443 will be used. e.g. https://api.masocp-joalae.mydomain.myorg.com

basics.name: openShiftUser
basics.label: OpenShift user
basics.toolTip: Username to access existing OCP cluster.

basics.name: openShiftPassword
basics.toolTip: Password to access existing OCP cluster.

basics.name: entitledRegistryKey
basics.toolTip: Entitled registry key.

basics.name: openShiftPullSecret
basics.toolTip: OpenShift Pull secret to download operator images. JSON string can be pasted as is.

basics.name: masLicenseUrl
basics.label: MAS license URL
basics.toolTip: Blob SAS Url URL of MAS license file. e.g. https://masocpstgaccount.blob.core.windows.net/masocpcontainer/entitlement.lic?<blob-sas-token> (Applicable only for BYOL product)

basics.name: masManageDBUser
basics.label: MAS Manage DB user
basics.toolTip: User name for the database to be configured with MAS Manage app. (Applicable only if OfferingType is 'MAS Core + Manage') e.g. db2inst1

basics.name: masManageDBPassword
basics.toolTip: Password for the database to be configured with MAS Manage app. (Applicable only if OfferingType is 'MAS Core + Manage')

basics.name: masManageDBJdbcUrl
basics.label: MAS Manage DB JDBC URL
basics.toolTip: JDBC URL for the database to be configured with MAS Manage app. (Applicable only if OfferingType is 'MAS Core + Manage') e.g. jdbc:db2://1.2.3.4:50051/FTMDB:sslConnection=true;

basics.name: masManageDBCertificateUrl
basics.label: MAS Manage DB certificate URL
basics.toolTip: HTTP or S3 URL of database public certificate file. (Applicable only if OfferingType is 'MAS Core + Manage') e.g. s3://masocp-license/db-certificate.crt

basics.name: importDemoData
basics.label: Import demo data
basics.toolTip: Whether or not to import demo data in the MAS database.

basics.name: sshPublicKey
basics.label: SSH public key
basics.toolTip: Specifies the SSH rsa public key file as a string. Use "ssh-keygen -t rsa -b 2048" to generate your SSH key pairs.

basics.name: slsEndpointUrl
basics.label: SLS endpoint URL
basics.toolTip: SLS endpoint URL. Must be accessible to the deployment. It can be retrieved from the OCP route named 'sls-*' in the namespace where SLS is deployed.

basics.name: slsRegistrationKey
basics.label: SLS registration key
basics.toolTip: SLS registration key, normally available as a key 'status.registrationKey' in 'License Service' instance YAML in the SLS deployed namespace.

basics.name: slsPublicCertificateUrl
basics.label: SLS public certificate URL
basics.toolTip: Blob SAS Url URL of SLS public certificate file. e.g. https://masocpstgaccount.blob.core.windows.net/masocpcontainer/sls.crt?<blob-sas-token>

basics.name: basEndpointUrl
basics.label: BAS endpoint URL
basics.toolTip: BAS endpoint URL. Must be accessible to the deployment. It can be retrieved from the OCP route named 'bas-endpoint' in the namespace where BAS is deployed.

basics.name: basAPIKey
basics.label: BAS API key
basics.toolTip: BAS API key, normally available in OCP secret 'bas-api-key' in the BAS deployed namespace.

basics.name: basPublicCertificateUrl
basics.label: BAS public certificate URL
basics.toolTip: Blob SAS Url URL of BAS public certificate file. e.g. https://masocpstgaccount.blob.core.windows.net/masocpcontainer/bas.crt?<blob-sas-token>

basics.name: azureServicePrincipalClientId
basics.label: Azure service principal client Id
basics.toolTip: Azure service principal client Id.

basics.name: azureServicePrincipalClientSecret

label.confirmPassword: Confirm Azure service principal client secret

basics.toolTip: Azure service principal client secret.

basics.name: notificattionEmailAddress
basics.label: Notification Email Address
basics.toolTip: Email address to send email to. If empty, no email will be sent.

basics.name: sendGridAPIKey
basics.toolTip: SendGrid API key for sending the deployment completion email. If empty, no email will be sent.

basics.name: emailNotification
basics.label: Email Notification
basics.toolTip: Indicate whether you want to receive emails that contain the connection details and credentials for the Suite.
